mapper.insert: insert into board( board_no, board_id, board_title, board_content) values( board_seq.nextval, #{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.update: update board set board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, board_edittime=sysdate
mapper.select: select * from board instr(${type),#{keyword})>0 order by ${type} asc
